account_sid.description: The SID of the Account that created the resource

api_version.description: The API version used to process the message

date_created.description: The RFC 2822 date and time in GMT that the resource was created

date_sent.description: The RFC 2822 date and time in GMT when the message was sent

date_updated.description: The RFC 2822 date and time in GMT that the resource was last updated

error_code.description: The error code associated with the message

from.description: The phone number that initiated the message

messaging_service_sid.description: The SID of the Messaging Service used with the message.

num_media.description: The number of media files associated with the message

num_segments.description: The number of messages used to deliver the message body

price.description: The amount billed for the message

price_unit.description: The currency in which price is measured

sid.description: The unique string that identifies the resource

subresource_uris.description: A list of related resources identified by their relative URIs

to.description: The phone number that received the message

uri.description: The URI of the resource, relative to `https://api.twilio.com`
